name: Sokoban (Arĥimedeς ℳontegasppα)
description:
Sokoban clone in an MSX style. You need TIC-80 in order to run or edit the game.

  • Button A (Z key) to undo.
  • Button B (X key) to quit/reset.
  • Stick (arrow keys) to move.

It took me a lotta work to create the whole maze set (90 levels altogether), so please let me know if you find any bugs!

I myself have found unplayable levels and fixed ’em!
